activities: Axiom Managed Services conducts contract review and analysis for clients operating all over the world, including within the EU and/or Switzerland.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data received from our clients for the purposes of contract review and analysis, which may be manually processed
recoursemech: For complaints that cannot be resolved between Axiom and the complainant, we will resolve the dispute under the enforcement principle of the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles through the American Arbitration Association (AAA).
